/* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.RefundMapper.findSettlement */ SELECT ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ , ST.PROD_ID , PR.PROD_NAME , ST.USER_ID , EP.EMP_NAME , ST.CUST_ID , CU.CUST_NAME , ST.REQ_DATE , ST.PROD_AMT , ST.SALE_AMT , ST.INFLOW_CNT , ST.SALE_TOTAL_AMT , ST.REQ_GUBUN , ST.EXPECT_AMT , ST.EXPECT_RATE_AMT , ST.USE_MILEAGE , DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_FROM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_FROM , DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_TO, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_TO , ST.WORK_DAY , IFNULL(ST.INCENTIVE_RATE, 0) AS INCENTIVE_RATE , ST.REFUND_IND , CD.CODE_NAME AS STATUS_NAME , ST.PROD_TOTAL_AMT , ST.MILEAGE_USE_IND , ST.EXIST_MILEAGE , ST.GUBUN FROM SETTLEMENT ST LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTOMER CU ON ST.CO_CODE = CU.CO_CODE AND ST.CUST_ID = CU.BIZ_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCTS PR ON ST.CO_CODE = PR.CO_CODE AND ST.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN TB_EMP EP ON ST.CO_cODE = EP.CO_CODE AND ST.USER_ID = EP.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN CDBASE CD ON CD.CO_CODE = ST.CO_CODE AND CD.PATTERN_CODE = 'SE02' AND CD.BASE_CODE = ST.APPLY_STATUS WHERE 1=1 AND ST.CO_CODE = #{loginCoId} AND ST.USER_ID = #{loginUserId} AND IFNULL(ST.REFUND_IND, 'N') != 'Y' AND ST.APPLY_STATUS = '02' -- 승인완료(SE04) AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= ST.DATE_WORK_TO AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= ST.DATE_WORK_FROM AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT ST2.SETTLEMENT_SEQ FROM SETTLEMENT ST2 WHERE ST2.CO_CODE = ST.CO_CODE AND ST2.REFUND_SETTLEMENT_SEQ = ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ )
AND ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{settlementSeq}, '%')
